paragraphs.body: Baker was born in Indiana but grew up in Greeley, Colorado. He started performing at the age of nine and had steady work in musicals, operas, plays and stand up comedy until college.
paragraphs.text: Baker was born in Indiana but grew up in Greeley, Colorado. He started performing at the age of nine and had steady work in musicals, operas, plays and stand up comedy until college.

paragraphs.body: He is a graduate of Colorado College, located in Colorado Springs. There, he majored in philosophy and also studied German. Baker started working as a stage actor, stand up comedian, and singer after college, which led him to Los Angeles.
paragraphs.text: He is a graduate of Colorado College, located in Colorado Springs. There, he majored in philosophy and also studied German. Baker started working as a stage actor, stand up comedian, and singer after college, which led him to Los Angeles.

paragraphs.body: Baker has also done work on game shows, announcing for Legends of the Hidden Temple and Shop 'til You Drop. In Legends, he also provided the voice of the show's mascot, Olmec, and on Shop 'til You Drop, Baker would dress up and play a role in some of the main game's stunts.
paragraphs.text: Baker has also done work on game shows, announcing for Legends of the Hidden Temple and Shop 'til You Drop. In Legends, he also provided the voice of the show's mascot, Olmec, and on Shop 'til You Drop, Baker would dress up and play a role in some of the main game's stunts.

paragraphs.body: As of 2007, he is the voice of Captain Jack Sparrow's talking parrot in the newly refurbished Pirates of the Caribbean rides at Disneyland and the Magic Kingdom.
paragraphs.text: As of 2007, he is the voice of Captain Jack Sparrow's talking parrot in the newly refurbished Pirates of the Caribbean rides at Disneyland and the Magic Kingdom.

paragraphs.body: He and his wife Michelle have two daughters, Josie and ${link_0}.
paragraphs.text: He and his wife Michelle have two daughters, Josie and Cora.
